title: "You're playing an easy Champ"
body:
So I play a fucking Renekton vs Gnar top lane, I shit on this Gnar so hard which he is a tank ofc. I mean seriously half the time when you have someone on your team who is melee vs a range, they fed like shit non-stop. I did my best to carry this heavy ass scrub on my team and they talk shit?! YOU"RE GETTING FUCKING CARRY, YOU HAVE NO ROOM TO TALK  

Seriously tho, when you're getting carry (JUST STFU)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

But back to my TOPIC

"You're playing an easy Champ"

So I play Renekton, sure he a easy Champ to use, but is the fucking match up easy? No it ain't when you're playing against a damn range.
So this guy act like he can do as good as I did just because he think its easy. LMAO 

_**Typical noobs who think they can do the same thing watching LCS **_

If every damn Champ or Match-Up is easy, why couldn't you win your lane (I told him that)? He couldn't say shit because he was feeding so damn hard. No that was a joke he did talk shit like a babyrage mofo he is. That what bronze are anyway, they can't shut up and think they do well even when they are not.
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
_**YEAH THIS EXPLAIN THE SPAM ON THE LEAGUE BOARD OF BRONZE COMING HERE CRYING WHY THEY'RE PLACE BRONZE AGAIN WHEN THEY ARE BRONZE OR LOW SILVER LAST SEASON**_
